job_description:
• Proven ability to work with diverse skill levels and personalities in a variety of scenarios, and to develop partnerships with support groups and customer groups Experience or knowledge in one or more scripting, programming and visualization tools (i.
• Python, Java, Tableau, Matlab, Microsoft Suite) Completes all required safety training and conducts all work in accordance with Micron and Technology Development (TD) safety policies Demonstrated analytical problem solving skills with ability to troubleshoot complex problems and address root causes Demonstrated ability to identify, develop, propose, and implement effective plans to improve overall efficiency Advanced problem-solver – understanding of data, good data intuition and data visualization skills Proven track-record of self-motivation, strong multi-tasking capabilities, and measurable results Hands-on experience in the field of data analytics, preferably with experience querying databases Working knowledge of database management methods and techniques including proficiency in SQL Demonstrated ability to organize and efficiently facilitate meetings and project teams.
